TopicTitle: how to (quickly) unlock parts in the unlocked tech node?

Articles.Content:
i believe most of us have run into this problem in which we at some point installed a huge mod which has hundreds of parts after we had gone pretty deep in the tech tree.

and is forced to click the parts in the previously unlock node to unlock them one by one.

so, is there a way to do it all at once?

or...at least not as stupid as having to click the individual parts one by one?
Theres a mod called "ResearchThemAll" you can check out.

Theres a mod called "ResearchThemAll" you can check out.

awesome, I did not know about this. nice 1.
